price: Uko (kubahindurira tubaha imirima mibi), twabikoze (nk’igihano) kubera ubuhakanyi bwabo. Ese hari abandi duhanisha (igihano gikaze) usibye abahakanyi?
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū wahal nujāzī illā al-kafūra
